name: board-game-scorekeep
description: Board Game Score Tracker - Full-stack application with React frontend and Express backend

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=backend && npm run build --workspace=frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=frontend && npm run lint --workspace=backend
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=frontend && npm run test --workspace=backend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage --workspace=frontend && npm run test:coverage --workspace=backend
scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspace=frontend --if-present && npm run clean --workspace=backend --if-present
